dependenciesConfirmation.message:
$modName$ has $modCount$ mods that are most likely required for it to work. Would you like to download them?

Attention: Allowing your browser to download multiple files is required for this operation.

Due to technical limitations, not all mods may be downloaded at the same time.
dependenciesConfirmation.description: Alert that appears if a mod that the user wants to download has dependencies.
